channel.title: CVE Feed for Atlassian -- Crucible
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Atlassian -- Crucible

item.title: CVE-2019-15009|2024-09-17T00:26:28.578Z -- atlassian -- crucible
item.description: The /json/profile/removeStarAjax.do resource in Atlassian Fisheye and Crucible before version 4.8.0 allows remote attackers to remove another user's favourite setting for a project via an improper authorization vulnerability.
